name: Posten – Gutenberg Post Block
author: Zakaria Binsaifullah

sections.description:
Posten provides custom Gutenberg block related to Post that allows you to showcase your blog posts in different styles. You don’t need to have any coding knowledge. It is fast and light-weight. It is highly customizable.

Video Tutorial

Key Features

  • Simple, light-weight, and fast
  • Developed with Gutenberg Native Components
  • Post Grid and List View
  • Simple drag and drop using
  • Highly Customizable
  • Clean & smart customization panels
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/posten-post-blocks directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->posten-post-blocks screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
sections.faq:
Is it responsive?

Yes, it is responsive.

Will it slow down my site?

Never, it is light-weight and never slow down your site. In addition, it only loads scripts on the pages where the block is used.

Is it built with Gutenberg Native Components?

Yes, it is built with Gutenberg Native Components.

Can I use it with any theme?

Yes, you can use it with any theme. It is compatible with most of the themes. We have tested it with the most popular themes.
